TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Use
TERMS.WELCOME: Welcome to SheinTraders! Please read these Terms of Use carefully before using our website and services.

SECTION1.TITLE: 1. Acceptance of Terms
SECTION1.CONTENT: By accessing or using SheinTraders (“the Site”), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Site.

SECTION2.TITLE: 2. Use of the Site
SECTION2.CONTENT: You agree to use SheinTraders only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others or restrict their use of the Site. You must not:
SECTION2.POINT1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
SECTION2.POINT2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Site or related systems.
SECTION2.POINT3: Use the Site to upload or distribute harmful, offensive, or illegal content.

SECTION3.TITLE: 3. Intellectual Property
SECTION3.CONTENT: All content, trademarks, logos, and materials on SheinTraders are the property of SheinTraders or its licensors and are protected by copyright and trademark laws. You agree not to copy, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

SECTION4.TITLE: 4. User Accounts
SECTION4.CONTENT: You may need to create an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities under your account. Please notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use.

SECTION5.TITLE: 5. Privacy
SECTION5.CONTENT: Your use of the Site is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

SECTION6.TITLE: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
SECTION6.CONTENT: SheinTraders is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the Site will be error-free or uninterrupted.

SECTION7.TITLE: 7. Limitation of Liability
SECTION7.CONTENT: To the fullest extent permitted by law, SheinTraders shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use of or inability to use the Site.

SECTION8.TITLE: 8. Changes to Terms
SECTION8.CONTENT: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting on the Site. Your continued use of the Site constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

SECTION9.TITLE: 9. Governing Law
SECTION9.CONTENT: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Lebanon/Beuirt].

SECTION10.TITLE: 10. Contact Us
SECTION10.CONTENT: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at [infokamlion@gmail.com].
